name: @directus/openapi
description: OpenAPI Specification of the Directus API

scripts.dev: nodemon --watch './openapi/**/*.yaml' --exec 'redocly bundle ./openapi/index.yaml -o ./dist/index.yaml && pnpm scalar serve ./dist/oas.yaml -p 5001' --ext yaml
scripts.build: redocly bundle ./openapi/index.yaml -o ./dist/oas.yaml && redocly bundle ./openapi/index.yaml -o ./dist/oas.json --ext json && jiti scripts/build-js.ts
